chooseEquipment.text: Click on the Random Table links to get money and a Kai Weapon before continuing

message.text: You may take up to five of the following (all meals count as one object):
Drop one item of your choice to pay for a Standard room before continuing

numberPicker.text: Choose the number of Endurance Points you are prepared to deduct

message.text: Drop Special Items of your choice to restore Endurance points
Drop either 1 Weapon or 2 Backpack Items before continuing

numberPicker.text: Choose the number of Gold Crowns you are going to donate
Choose the number of Gold Crowns you would like to place

message.text: Drop two items of your choice from your Backpack Items list before continuing

numberPicker.text: Choose the number of Endurance Points you are prepared to deduct

message.text: Drop one item of your choice from your Backpack Items list, or a Weapon if you do not possess any Backpack Items
Drop Backpack Items of your choice to restore Endurance points
Drop one item of your choice to pay for a Standard room before continuing
Drop one Backpack Item of your choice to pay the toll
